name: The Amazing Universe of the Psychotrons
storyline: Agent Plotkin is a living mushroom, a truffle-man. He has a mission to recover the lost neurons of a mad scientist disappeared because his own obsessions: The Psychotrons, jabby entities really weird and ironic. During the mission the player will discover a universe of strange phenomenon and wry words in silly and funny rhymes but will also discover other rulers of the psychotronic reality: the Archons and ... much more.
summary: Adventure 2D, retro but not pixel art, you are Agent Plotkin and you wander in O'Psy Town to collect the lost neurons of a mad professor overhauled by its own obsessions. He called those PSYCHOTRONS! Jabby and nervous entities o fthe subconscious.
